attributes.review: If I could build a way over this app I would and make Apple pay for it. I don’t know why people are downloading this specific app because all apps matter.
attributes.title: Just God Awful

attributes.review: this app takes up WAY too much storage on your phone and sends WAY too many notifications. it’s super annoying, just saying i would NOT get this app.
attributes.title: terrible app

attributes.review: I’m not lying when I say worst app ever. This is the President of the United States’ app. I expected more from it. It crashes every time I use it. It takes forever to load. It seems so low budget.
attributes.title: Terrible app

attributes.review: my cat died because of this app. i was walking my cat down the highway when a trump support ran over my cat and then beat me up and downloaded this app on my phone!! i’m down with these cult supporters. #justiceformycatbartha 😿😾
attributes.title: HORRIBLE😿😤

attributes.review: this app made my phone crash constantly 😬 it has nothing to do with my phone itself as i have an XR and it’s never done this before now.
attributes.title: awful

attributes.review: The amount of malware and viruses and pop ups I got from this app in the ten minutes of having it was ridiculous. This should never, EVER be downloaded. It will end up bad, trust me. It’s literally spam
attributes.title: WORST thing in the WORLD

attributes.review: This app is so bad if I could give it less then one star I would because this man wants my phone number in the app that weird if I where you I would never download this app.
attributes.title: Bad

attributes.review: I wanted to see where trump was with his campaign. But every time I open the app my whole phone restarts. I mean where am I supposed to look at a racist orange and how he’s gonna loose if this keeps happening.
attributes.title: 🧚✨this app is bad✨🧚

attributes.review: I don’t have Tik Tok so I don’t know about the whole Gen Z situation. I downloaded it to see trumps plans if he does win the election because I’m too lazy to watch all of his speeches. EVERY TIME I OPENED THIS APP IT WOULD CRASH. I eventually got tired of it and just deleted it.
attributes.title: KEPT ON CRASHING

attributes.review: I figured I’d give our loving president a shot and download the app, after using my Face ID to proceed download I click on the app and I hear a small whisper in a cheeto voice that says “go back to Mexico” very displeased with the app
attributes.title: Worst app ever
